translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm afraid I'm running out of time.
translation.fr: Désolée. Je n'ai plus beaucoup de temps.

translation.en: First, may I say, it's amazing that you're here.
translation.fr: C'est remarquable de vous voir ici.

translation.en: One of the world's leading prosecutors in international criminal law.
translation.fr: Un des meilleurs magistrats mondiaux du droit pénal international.

translation.en: And I get to ask you a question.
What motivates you to vomit up all this neocolonialist bullshit?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui vous motive à débiter ces conneries néocolonialistes ?

translation.en: I'm motivated to see justice done, wherever the crime took place.
translation.fr: Je suis motivée par la justice en tout lieu.

translation.en: And it just so happens, all these crimes, they take place in Africa?
translation.fr: Tous ces crimes ont eu lieu en Afrique ?
On ne juge que les affaires

translation.en: a country is unable or unwilling to prosecute for itself.
translation.fr: dont le pays n'a pas la capacité ou la volonté de le faire.

translation.en: So, what about the West Bank?
I believe that's an active situation.
But when it comes to action, there are at least 40 individuals being prosecuted
translation.fr: Mais concernant l'action, il y a au moins 40 individus poursuivis

translation.en: by the International Criminal Court now.
And each and every one of them are Africans.
And I'm sure they all have a case to answer,
translation.fr: Ils doivent tous répondre de faits

translation.en: properly represented in a court of law.
translation.fr: et seront défendus dans un tribunal.

translation.en: But you're telling us you successfully prosecuted one of those cases.
translation.fr: Vous avez en poursuivi un avec succès.

translation.en: After all, isn't what you do
just the latest example of self-righteous Western paternalism?
translation.fr: de la pure arrogance paternaliste occidentale ?

translation.en: that for hundreds of years has systematically decimated that continent
translation.fr: que celle qui a décimé ce continent il y a des siècles,

translation.en: of its wealth, its governments, its religions,
and most of all, its people.
And now, having done it, you have the temerity
to expect them to turn to you for justice.
For justice that only you can provide
for crimes that surely would never have happened
translation.fr: pour un crime qui n'aurait pas eu lieu

translation.en: had your world not gone there in the first place.
translation.fr: si votre monde n'était jamais venu là.

translation.en: So you're right, I wouldn't feel embarrassed.
translation.fr: En effet, ce n'est pas une gêne

translation.en: 'Cause if I was you, I'd feel fucking ashamed.
-[audience murmurs] -[man] Stop. That's it. I'm so sorry.
-This is not the time. -Then when is the time?
translation.fr: - Ce n'est pas le moment. - Quand alors ?

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I really have gone far over-- -Of course.
Just a minute. Can I just say one thing?
I stand by my record because it is a record of justice. All right?
translation.fr: Je maintiens mon bilan car c'est un bilan de justice.

translation.en: Whatever the cause, whatever the history,
we have delivered justice to the people who needed it most
translation.fr: on rend justice aux peuples qui en ont besoin

translation.en: when otherwise they might not have had it at all.
translation.fr: car ils pourraient n'en avoir aucune.

translation.en: And I'm proud to have done that, and I'm proud to keep doing that.
translation.fr: Je suis fière de l'avoir fait et de continuer à le faire.

translation.en: And it may help you to know that my daughter is black
translation.fr: Sachez que ma fille est noire

translation.en: -and she was born in Africa. -It doesn't.
translation.fr: et elle est née en Afrique. Et alors ?

translation.en: Not unless she's the one with the solutions.
translation.fr: Tant qu'elle ne porte pas les solutions.

translation.en: [man] Are you sure you don't want to wait?
[woman] This is about me, not her.
[man] Last time, she said she wanted to be here.
translation.fr: Elle a dit qu'elle voulait être là.

translation.en: And I have come all on my own.
Maybe that's how she wants it.
[man] And how do you feel about that?
We've had this conversation a couple of times now.
translation.fr: On a déjà eu cette conversation.

translation.en: And how do you feel about that?

translation.fr: En fait, je suis enquêteur juridique.

translation.en: And how are things at work?
Can't give a nutjob too much responsibility.
translation.fr: Je peux pas délirer, trop de responsabilités.

translation.en: [man] Do you see yourself as a patient...
I see myself as a patient.
translation.fr: je me vois comme une patiente.

translation.en: Only the truly mad think they're in control of their life.
translation.fr: Seuls les vrais fous pensent contrôler leur vie.

translation.en: Is that Adam West enough for you, Mr. Riddler?
-Am I really going to tell you I didn't? -But the stuff on survivor's guilt?
translation.fr: Je vais vous dire que non ? Sur la culpabilité du survivant ?

translation.en: I don't know who it is I'm supposed to connect with.
translation.fr: Avec qui donc je devrais faire un lien ?

translation.en: Guess that's why I tried to kill myself.
translation.fr: C'est pourquoi j'ai essayé de me tuer.

translation.en: If I ever do try, I'll be sure to take a leaf out of Mr. Levi's book
translation.fr: Si ça arrive, je prendrai exemple sur M. Levi

translation.en: and jump straight out the window.
translation.fr: et je me jetterai par la fenêtre.

translation.en: I'm just kidding with you. It's a joke.
translation.fr: Je vous fais marcher. C'est une blague.

translation.en: Do you know your birth name?
[clicks tongue] There's no one left alive to tell me.
translation.fr: Aucun survivant pour me le dire.

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm so sorry.
I was at this lecture, and...
it was fucking horrible, and I couldn't get out.
-[woman] It's all right. -Then there was the traffic,
translation.fr: Ça va. Puis les bouchons et mon putain de portable en panne.

translation.en: and my fucking phone's run out.
translation.fr: Puis les bouchons et mon putain de portable en panne.

translation.en: Why do they keep putting all this shit in it if the battery can't cope?
translation.fr: Pourquoi rajouter ces merdes si la batterie ne tient pas ?
Tu n'as pas eu besoin de moi ?

translation.en: -[sighs] So, what did he say? -[woman clicks tongue]
-But you don't have to come back? -Nope.
translation.fr: Mais tu ne dois pas y retourner.

translation.en: Not unless I exceed the stated dose again.
translation.fr: Tant que je ne dépasse pas la dose, à nouveau.

translation.en: You're talking to a major depressive. This is how we cope.
translation.fr: Tu parles à une dépressive majeure, qui gère.

translation.en: You want to go out for supper?
Well, unless one of my 57 boyfriends have called,
translation.fr: Sauf si un de mes 57 petits copains a appelé,

translation.en: I may find myself strangely available.
-There are reasons for that, my darling. -Certainly are.
translation.fr: Il y a des raisons, ma chérie. Certainement.

translation.en: Not the least, watching a man's dick shrivel
translation.fr: Comme la queue d'un homme réduite

translation.en: to the size of a cashew nut every time he looks at my stomach.
translation.fr: à la taille d'une noix de cajou chaque fois qu'il voit mon ventre.

translation.en: -[Eve] What else are mothers for? -[woman laughs]
translation.fr: À quoi d'autre sert une mère ?

translation.en: You knew I wasn't going to be in the office this afternoon.
translation.fr: Tu savais que je serais absente.
Le prix de ma conscience écologique.

translation.en: I once shot at a polar bear.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà tiré sur un ours.

translation.en: [Michael] Ready to do some proper work?
You came all this way just to say that?
Oh. She'll be in the office.
-She's on her way, probably held up. -Her phone's switched off.
translation.fr: Elle est en route. Son portable est éteint.

translation.en: Might be a case coming in.
And even put on my old uniform. It is a little bit tight! [chuckles]
translation.fr: Et mettre mon vieil uniforme... un peu serré.

translation.en: [in English] This has been going on for a while.
translation.fr: Ça fait un moment que ça dure.

translation.en: They keep stopping my trucks from entering.
translation.fr: - Ils empêchent mes camions d'entrer. - Oui.
- Ils empêchent mes camions d'entrer. - Oui. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Because they keep turning up with the wrong paperwork.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont pas les bons papiers.
La section 15-02 de la loi Dodd-Frank

translation.en: requires us to guarantee that all the minerals imported--
translation.fr: demande la garantie que tout minerais...

translation.en: ...all minerals imported from the Democratic Republic of the Congo
translation.fr: ...tout minerais importé de la république démocratique du Congo

translation.en: Your trucks have no such certification, and therefore they cannot pass.
translation.fr: Sans ce certificat, tes camions ne peuvent pas passer.

translation.en: -I am fighting a war... -[man] I know.
translation.fr: - Je fais la guerre... - Je sais.

translation.en: -Because the Americans tell you-- -Because the war is over.
translation.fr: - Les Américains te disent... - La guerre est finie.

translation.en: And in peacetime, you cannot keep stealing from those mines.
translation.fr: En temps de paix, tu ne peux pas piller ces mines.

translation.en: -How else do I pay my men? -You don't.
translation.fr: - Comment je paie mes hommes ? - Oublie.

translation.en: My officers would rather die than leave my sight.
translation.fr: Mes officiers préfèrent mourir que me quitter.

translation.en: Your officers offered to shoot you whilst you slept.
translation.fr: Ils ont proposé de te tuer pendant ton sommeil.

translation.en: You have not paid them for a long time.
translation.fr: Tu ne les as pas payés depuis longtemps.

translation.en: [voice growing louder] Because you keep stopping my fucking trucks!
translation.fr: Parce que tu continues d'arrêter mes putain de camions.

translation.en: we were in this taxi, you and me, and I asked the driver--
translation.fr: toi et moi dans ce taxi, j'ai demandé au chauffeur...

translation.en: It was just to make a point.
The dog ends up dead in a ditch, and the cat gets away.
translation.fr: Le chien est mort et le chat s'est enfui.

translation.en: For you not to be the dog, yes.
translation.fr: Pour que tu ne sois pas le chien.

translation.en: There is someone here to see you.
translation.fr: Il y a quelqu'un pour toi.

translation.en: What can a muzungu offer me?
A way to end this now.
If I want to go home...
I think you're going to have to go somewhere else first, my old friend.
translation.fr: D'abord, tu vas devoir aller ailleurs, mon vieil ami.

translation.en: [man] General Nyamoya, welcome to The Hague.
translation.fr: Général Nyamoya, bienvenue à La Haye.

translation.en: rebel army leader General Simon Nyamoya is tonight behind bars in Holland,
translation.fr: Le chef de l'armée rebelle Nyamoya est derrière les barreaux... CHEF MILITAIRE AFRICAIN ARRÊTÉ

translation.en: awaiting trial for war crimes at the International Criminal Court.
translation.fr: ...en attendant son procès pour crimes de guerre.

translation.en: [Tracy] 1994, and while the world looked elsewhere,
translation.fr: En 1994, alors que le monde a les yeux rivés ailleurs,

translation.en: the small East African state of Rwanda stared into the abyss.
translation.fr: le petit État est-africain du Rwanda plonge dans l'abysse.

translation.en: Eight hundred thousand massacred in a hundred-day killing frenzy
translation.fr: Un massacre de 800 000 personnes en 100 jours de folie meurtrière

translation.en: while the international community stood by.
translation.fr: dans d'indifférence de la communauté internationale.

translation.en: The perpetrators, members of the Hutu majority,
translation.fr: Les responsables, membres de la majorité hutu,

translation.en: led by a genocidal government, who, overnight,
translation.fr: dirigés par une autorité génocide, qui soudain

translation.en: turned on their Tutsi neighbors, following years of ethnic tension.
translation.fr: s'est retournée contre les Tutsis, après des années de tensions.

translation.en: The saviors, a returning Tutsi Army, the RPF,
translation.fr: Les sauveurs, une armée tutsi, la RPF

translation.en: which General Simon Nyamoya helped to lead.
translation.fr: que le général Nyamoya a contribué à diriger.

translation.en: The RPF brought the savagery to an end
translation.fr: La RPF a mis fin à la sauvagerie

translation.en: and were applauded the world over for their heroism.
translation.fr: et a été applaudie par le monde entier pour son héroïsme.

translation.en: But a quarter of a century on, a different story.
translation.fr: Mais un quart de siècle plus tard, c'est une autre histoire.

translation.en: Today, Simon Nyamoya is no longer the heroic victor of yesteryear,
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, Nyamoya n'est plus le vainqueur héroïque de jadis,

translation.en: but instead, wears the badgeless beret of a Congolese mercenary,
translation.fr: mais porte le béret sans insigne d'un mercenaire congolais,

translation.en: fueling endless conflicts on illicit riches
translation.fr: attisant des conflits sur des richesses illicites
volées des mines de la région.

translation.en: That Nyamoya is finally to face his day in court
translation.fr: Que Nyamoya se retrouve au tribunal,

translation.en: may indeed be cause for celebration.
translation.fr: peut être une cause de festivités.

translation.en: Although, having already been ostracized by his old allies,
translation.fr: Bien qu'il soit déjà banni par ses anciens alliés,

translation.en: whether he remained an actual threat to the region is harder to assess.
translation.fr: il est difficile de dire s'il représente toujours une menace pour la région.

translation.en: Indeed, Bibi Mundanzi, Rwanda's long-term president
translation.fr: En effet, Bibi Mundazi, la présidente du Rwanda

translation.en: However, she has previously questioned why the West targets men like Nyamoya,
translation.fr: Elle a demandé par le passé, pourquoi l'Occident vise des hommes comme Nyamoya,

translation.en: some responsible for the genocide itself, remain at-large and untouched.
translation.fr: des responsables du génocide, ne sont pas inquiétés.

translation.en: [David] Of course, there are many people hiding in our neighboring forests
translation.fr: Assurément, beaucoup de gens se cachent dans les forêts voisines,

translation.en: responsible for acts of genocide against this country,
translation.fr: et sont responsables d'actes de génocide,
mais ils ne peuvent pas se cacher à jamais

translation.en: -and they will be caught. -[woman] In the meantime,
translation.fr: et ils seront arrêtés. En attendant,

translation.en: you're happy to be sending Simon Nyamoya, your onetime ally,
translation.fr: vous vous réjouissez d'envoyer Simon Nyamoya, jadis allié,

translation.en: to the Americans. We did not send him anywhere.
translation.fr: aux Américains. On ne l'a envoyé nulle part.

translation.en: [woman] But is the president happy to see him tried there?
She is happy to see justice occur wherever it is delivered.
translation.fr: Elle est satisfaite que justice soit faite, où que ce soit.

translation.en: [woman] But in the past she's been highly critical of the ICC.
translation.fr: Elle était très critique de la CPI par le passé.

translation.en: Officially, she doesn't even recognize it.
We have a great faith in the international community.
translation.fr: Nous avons confiance en la communauté internationale.

translation.en: I may remind you that in the last year alone,
we have enjoyed investments of $1.2 billion;
translation.fr: nous avons profité d'investissements de 1,2 milliards de $,
mais du monde des affaires, de banques,

translation.en: mining, tourism, construction, all regulated, certified, and guaranteed.
translation.fr: industrie minière, tourisme, construction. Le tout régulé, certifié et garanti.

translation.en: Our doors are open. The world is welcome.
translation.fr: Nos portes sont ouvertes, au monde entier.

translation.en: And is General Nyamoya the price for that?
translation.fr: Le général Nyamoya en est-il le prix ?
Vous ne cessez de le répéter.

translation.en: General Nyamoya gave himself up to the scrutiny of international justice.
translation.fr: Le général Nyamoya s'est rendu lui-même à la justice internationale.

translation.en: And because of this, I am certain
he will receive exactly the trial he deserves.
translation.fr: qu'il recevra le procès qu'il mérite.

translation.en: That's the best I can offer.
The last time Eve Ashby prosecuted the case here,
translation.fr: La dernière fois qu'Eve Ashby a représenté le ministère public,

translation.en: You could do with another one of those.
And she will be carefully considered along with the others.
Come on, Capi, what do I have to do to make this work, huh?
translation.fr: Capi, comment faire pour que ça marche ?

translation.en: Assistant Secretary, Peter. More talk like that will get me fired.
translation.fr: Assistant du ministre, Peter. De tels propos me perdront.

translation.en: [Peter] I thought we'd lost you for the day.
But now I'm back. That's politics, baby.
translation.fr: Mais je suis de retour. La politique.

translation.en: You told me to resist these questions as if you were the Devil himself.
translation.fr: Vous m'avez dit de résister à cette question.

translation.en: And a copy of the indictment in the General Nyamoya case?
translation.fr: Et une copie de l'acte d'accusation de Nyamoya ?

translation.en: And set up a call with Capi Petridis ASAP.
translation.fr: Et un appel à Capi Petritis.

translation.en: [Capi] And with whose authority are you making this request?
translation.fr: De quelle autorité fais-tu cette requête ?

translation.en: [assistant secretary] Capi, I'm head of the Bureau of African Affairs.
translation.fr: Je suis chef du Bureau des affaires africaines.

translation.en: I think it's fair to say that my authority is all you need to hear.
-Okay. I've heard it. -And what are you gonna do about it?
translation.fr: - Bien, j'ai entendu. - Que vas-tu faire ?

translation.en: her name is on the list along with the others.
translation.fr: son nom est sur la liste comme les autres.

translation.en: And what I'm suggesting to you
is there should only be one name on that list.
translation.fr: qu'il n'y ait qu'un nom sur la liste.

translation.en: Capi, I'm not sure you're quite getting what I'm offering here.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas sûre que tu comprennes ce qui est en jeu.

translation.en: My government has yet to ratify the Rome Statute,
translation.fr: Mon administration doit ratifier le Statut de Rome,

translation.en: and therefore we still do not recognize your court.
translation.fr: nous ne reconnaissons pas votre cour.

translation.en: But here is a perfect opportunity for us to take a big step towards that.
translation.fr: Voici la parfaite opportunité pour nous de faire un pas en avant.

translation.en: I strongly advise you to grab it.
translation.fr: Je te conseille de la saisir.

translation.en: Just because she's an old friend of yours?
Because she is the best prosecutor there is.
translation.fr: Parce qu'elle est la meilleure magistrate.

translation.en: You knew she was going to do that?
-I know it must feel very close-- -Close?
General Nyamoya is a Rwandan Tutsi, Mama.
translation.fr: Le général Nyamoya est un Rwandais tutsi, mama.

translation.en: -of 13 counts of war crimes. -Who helped stop the genocide.
translation.fr: - de 13 crimes... - Il a arrêté le génocide.

translation.en: And then he went into the Congo--

translation.fr: - Je suis une Tutsi, mama. - Non !

translation.en: -and you're my daughter. -Yes. Only because I survived.
translation.fr: - et tu es ma fille. - Oui. J'ai survécu.

translation.en: And without them, how would that have happened?
-It's not so simple, darling. -It is to me.
translation.fr: - Ce n'est pas si simple. - Ça l'est.

translation.en: I mean, to me, what you're doing, it's like the Second World War is over,
translation.fr: C'est comme si après la seconde guerre mondiale,

translation.en: and suddenly you've decided to prosecute General Eisenhower
translation.fr: et tu décides de poursuivre le général Eisenhower

translation.en: because he tried to stop Hitler.
Well, if Eisenhower had committed war crimes
-he would have been prosecuted-- -Yes! But not by you!
translation.fr: - il devrait être jugé... - Pas par toi.

translation.en: Because for me, it's like the SS is still out there.
translation.fr: C'est comme si les SS étaient libres.

translation.en: And all you're trying to do
is prosecute one of the few men who tried to stop them!
translation.fr: est de juger celui qui a tenté de les arrêter.

translation.en: Are you trying to drive a wedge between us, Mama?
translation.fr: Essaies-tu de creuser un fossé entre nous ?

translation.en: Make me stand on my own two feet?
translation.fr: De me faire avancer toute seule ?

translation.en: If you have me hovering over you for the rest of your life,
translation.fr: Si je te couve toute ta vie,
tu ne voleras pas de tes propres ailes.

translation.en: So, all this is-- is what? A way to cut me loose?
translation.fr: C'est quoi ? Une façon de me laisser partir ?

translation.en: You can't choose when something happens, Kate.
translation.fr: Tu ne choisis pas ce qui arrive.

translation.en: If it was 18 months ago, of course I wouldn't have done it,
translation.fr: Il y a un an et demi, je ne l'aurais pas fait,

translation.en: but it's not. It's now. And now you are better.
translation.fr: mais c'est maintenant. Tu vas mieux.

translation.en: -And now I have to take this case. -[crying] But why?
translation.fr: - Je dois prendre ce dossier. - Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Because it's the right thing to do.

translation.fr: Il y a encore des hommes

translation.en: You want to do the right thing?
It's just a mole. Not cancer.
translation.fr: Ce n'est qu'un grain de beauté. Rien de grave.

translation.en: It's quite large, though. I can remove it for you. Peace of mind?
translation.fr: Il est assez gros. Je peux vous l'enlever. Tranquillité d'esprit.

translation.en: It's very simple. A few minutes, no problem.
I'll wait until I go home.
No, no, no, no, it's just...
It's fine, Doctor. Really. Thanks for looking. It's much appreciated.
translation.fr: Ça va, docteur. Vraiment. Merci d'avoir regardé.

translation.en: Do you want francs or dollars?
You suspect I will flee the country?
translation.fr: Vous pensez que je quitterais le pays ?
- Qui ? - Ce type qui est passé.

translation.en: or do you work for him?
You know who that guy is?
That guy is a war criminal with an international warrant on his head.
translation.fr: C'est un criminel de guerre avec un mandat international contre lui.

translation.en: He's like a Hutu General who took part in the Rwandan genocide.
translation.fr: C'est un général hutu qui pris part au génocide rwandais.

translation.en: He's responsible for the death of about a million people.
translation.fr: Il est responsable de la mort d'un million de gens.

translation.en: He may not be the ace of spades, but he is certainly the ten of clubs.
translation.fr: Peut-être pas le grand chef mais bien un de ses subordonnés.

translation.en: Europeans have difficulty telling our faces apart.
translation.fr: les Européens ont du mal à nous distinguer.

translation.en: -Please, sir, you are in a hospital. -Yeah.
translation.fr: S'il vous plaît, c'est un hôpital.

translation.en: And he should be in The Hague.
translation.fr: Il devrait être à La Haye.

translation.en: -[car door slams] -You haven't answered the question.
And you haven't picked up that file.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas pris ce dossier.

translation.en: It's an immigration appeal. I'd like your opinion on it.
translation.fr: C'est un recours en matière d'immigration.

translation.en: Why did you give her the Nyamoya case?
translation.fr: Pourquoi lui avoir donné l'affaire Nyamoya ?

translation.en: I'm not saying there's any pressure on your room rental, Kate,
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas qu'il y a des pressions sur ta location,

translation.en: but obviously I wouldn't be saying it if there wasn't.
translation.fr: mais sinon je n'en parlerais pas.

translation.en: They're prosecuting the wrong man, on the wrong side.
translation.fr: Ils ne jugent pas l'homme qu'il faut.

translation.en: And you've chosen the wrong person to do it.
translation.fr: Avec la mauvaise personne pour le faire.

translation.en: Then you will be delighted when the judge agrees with you.
translation.fr: Tu seras ravie quand le juge te donnera raison.

translation.en: I prosecuted one of the first cases for the ICTR in '98.
translation.fr: J'ai instruit une des première affaires pour le TPIR en 1998.

translation.en: It's where we met. I'd go so far as to say it's why you're here.
translation.fr: On s'est rencontrés là. C'est la raison de ton arrivée.

translation.en: And I don't wanna go back
Do you think your mother loves you, Kate?
translation.fr: Tu crois que ta mère t'aime ?

translation.en: You think she'd ever do anything to harm you?
It is. So why do you keep asking it?
Your mother's one of the most steadfast and loyal people I have ever met,
translation.fr: Ta mère est des plus inébranlables et loyales,

translation.en: and most of that has been directed at you. She's also one of the smartest.
translation.fr: essentiellement pour toi. Elle est des plus brillantes.

translation.en: So if she's chosen to prosecute Simon Nyamoya,
translation.fr: Si elle a choisi de poursuivre Simon Nyamoya.

translation.en: I'd trust her to do it.
Let her do her job, Kate.
do yours. I'd like that back in the morning.
translation.fr: fais le tien. Je le voudrais pour demain matin.

translation.en: You taking on a new case?
I didn't think this was allowed.
translation.fr: Je ne croyais pas qu'on pouvait.

translation.en: Thought we weren't allowed to be in the same room together.
translation.fr: Qu'on était autorisés à être dans la même pièce.

translation.en: Your mother's asked me to be her permanent rep on the Nayamoya case.
translation.fr: Ta mère m'a demandé d'être son substitut sur l'affaire.

translation.en: You know she only got it yesterday?
everyone was pushing Nyamoya to hand himself in.
translation.fr: tout le monde poussait Nyamoya à se rendre.

translation.en: -He was a warlord. -There are others out there, far worse.
translation.fr: Il est chef militaire. Il y en a des bien pires.

translation.en: Well... same thing's happening to them.
translation.fr: Bien... la même chose leur arrive.

translation.en: Look, the region just wants to move on, Kate.
